name: Game Boy: Become Human
description:
Made for Minijam 30 + GB Studio, this was made to use as many of the possible limitations as I could, such as it being a demake, having multiple characters, and it being in a cyberpunk(ish) setting. 

This is currently in development and is nearly finished, but I'm currently out of town on vacation, Kara's chapter will be out as soon as possible.
